name: ❂ Hexaluga ❂ Witch Hunter's Travelling Castle ♉
description: Travel the world in your own moving castle fighting against monsters and helping people.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x64) Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Default
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x64) Processor: 2GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 or higher with 2GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Default
